::Rust::

A stasis pod's orbit slowly deteriorates above earth, the pod eventually 
plummeting down toward the planet. Looking like a comet in the sky, the pod 
falls onto the continent which would come to be called North America.

With a flash of light and a crashing sound, it lands a few hundred feet away 
from Whistler and begins scanning procedure.
